metadata.title: CVE-2024-36613 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: FFmpeg n6.1.1 has a vulnerability in the DXA demuxer of the libavformatlibrary allowing for an integer overflow, potentially resulting in adenial-of-service (DoS) condition or other undefined behavior.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
